channel.title: [562] How to change who can spawn, and how to add in-game owner crown. [562]

item.title: [562] How to change who can spawn, and how to add in-game owner crown. [562]
item.dc:creator: @EpicHeadShot EpicHeadShot
item.description:
@EpicHeadShot wrote:

kickyamom50:

There isn’t a crown for a 562 specifically because you may only be either an admin, or a mod, so you can’t make an owner crown, also i am not sure how to make it so that mods may spawn to, and btw that code is for the admin panel, the thing where you press the button under esc, “`”. you would need to add it into the other command packet handler, and in the quotes it needs to say “::item” you will need to ask someone else on changing it to mod rights, since i don’t know, and i have that problem too, hope i helped!

Yes you can make an in-game Owner Crown, look at Bo’s 562 CorruptionX, he’s got one ingame. And yes I know about the command packet handler shit, Wait a second, so your saying unless I put the command “item” into the command packet handler, only people that can use the Admin panel (’, backwards apostraphie) can use the command. Damn I’m stupid, Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: [562] How to change who can spawn, and how to add in-game owner crown. [562]

item.title: [562] How to change who can spawn, and how to add in-game owner crown. [562]
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

There isn’t a crown for a 562 specifically because you may only be either an admin, or a mod, so you can’t make an owner crown, also i am not sure how to make it so that mods may spawn to, and btw that code is for the admin panel, the thing where you press the button under esc, “`”. you would need to add it into the other command packet handler, and in the quotes it needs to say “::item” you will need to ask someone else on changing it to mod rights, since i don’t know, and i have that problem too, hope i helped!

item.title: [562] How to change who can spawn, and how to add in-game owner crown. [562]
item.dc:creator: @EpicHeadShot EpicHeadShot
item.description:
@EpicHeadShot wrote:

Hi, I want to know how to change which players can spawn, and I want to know how to add the in-game owner crown.
I am using the evolutionx 562 source, here is the ::item command code:

}
else if(cmd[0].equals(“item”)) {
if(cmd.length == 2 || cmd.length == 3) {
int item = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]);
int amount = 1;
if(cmd.length == 3) {
amount = Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]);
}
player.getInventory().addItem(item, amount);
} else {

I will give Mod on my server (once its up) to the first people that help me with one of these.

Read full topic
